string-array.name: challenge_list
string-array.item: 1_fox - The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog
3_jugs - Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs
4_jackets - My girl wove six dozen plaid jackets before she quit
5_wax - Jack quietly moved up front and seized the big ball of wax
6_wizards - Grumpy wizards make toxic brew for the evil queen and jack
7_Jove - By Jove, my quick study of lexicography won a prize
8_joke - My faxed joke won a pager in the cable TV quiz show
